text:
Hi Samantha, do you want to have a look at my Linkedin profile first? <https://www.linkedin.com/in/marianomelmancarrara/>
Happy to answer questions afterwards. Thanks. Mariano
Hi Mariano , awesome I taken a look. I was wondering is it quite common for producers to work with storyboard artists during production or is it more of a post production role ?
I'd say storyboards is a very important element of the pre-production. The post-production artists would still refer to the original boards when doing their work.
